export.popupBlocked: Please allow pop-ups to export PDF.
export.failedPdf: Failed to export PDF. Please try again.

dashboard.title: SaaS Northstar Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Configure KPI templates, import multiple CSV files, and export investor-ready visual reports. WCAG 2.1 AA compliant and keyboard friendly.
dashboard.emptyMetrics: No data imported yet. Go to the Import Wizard to upload CSV files.

cta.title: Need to import new KPI data from CSV?
cta.subtitle: The wizard supports multiple CSV files, field mapping, and automatic dashboard refresh.

b2b-saas.name: B2B SaaS Northstar
b2b-saas.description: Track recurring revenue, churn, and lifetime value for subscription-based B2B products.
b2b-saas.recommendedFor: Enterprise-focused SaaS teams that need monthly and annual revenue insights.

subscriptions.label: Subscription Revenue
subscriptions.description: Each row represents a subscription or renewal record.

churn.label: Churned Customers
churn.description: Records for customers that churned, used to calculate churn and LTV.

acquisition.label: Acquisition Spend
acquisition.description: Channel spend and new customers for CAC calculations.

b2c-product.name: B2C Growth Dashboard
b2c-product.description: Focus on user growth, conversion, and acquisition cost for consumer products.
b2c-product.recommendedFor: Consumer apps or storefronts that need unified growth and revenue tracking.

subscriptions.label: Revenue / Orders
subscriptions.description: Each row represents an order or subscription.

acquisition.label: Acquisition Channels
acquisition.description: Spend and performance per acquisition channel.

import.title: CSV Import Wizard
import.subtitle: Import multiple datasets, map fields, preview KPIs, and apply them to the dashboard. Data stays in browser memory for safety.

template.title: Choose KPI Template
template.description: Select the preset metrics that match your business.

upload.title: Upload CSV Data
upload.description: Drag and drop multiple data sources.

mapping.title: Field Mapping & Cleaning
mapping.description: Map CSV columns to template fields with auto suggestions.

review.title: Preview & Import
review.description: Review KPIs and charts, then apply to the dashboard.

dataset.hint: Tip: CSV files must contain a header row; column order is flexible.

mapping.hint: Fields with identical names are mapped automatically. Adjust manually if needed.

review.intro: Data parsed successfully. Review the KPIs and charts, then apply them to the dashboard.
review.success: ‚úÖ Data applied to dashboard. Return to the main view to confirm the latest KPIs.
review.warningTitle: ‚ö†Ô∏è The following items were skipped and will not affect the import:
review.warningOverflow: ‚Ä¶ Showing the first {{count}} warnings. Check the export for full details.

preview.title: Data Preview
preview.subtitle: Shows up to {{count}} rows. All rows are included in calculations.
preview.empty: No preview data yet. Upload CSV files first.

errors.oversize: File {{name}} exceeds the 10MB limit. Please split and try again.
errors.import: Import failed. Please try again later.
errors.export: {{type}} export failed. Please try again later.
